description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 2a (partly covered by repair). Physical description: Number of lines per page varies (from 36 to 25). Written in small naskh in black ink with use of red in Text 2. Dark cream paper, glossy, with laid lines and chain lines visible. Fol. 1 and 196 are later additions. Stained with dampness ; some worm damage ; a few loose leaves. Inscription in Arabic script in red pencil on fol. 1a: "Raqm 78". Origin: According to colophon, Text 2 copied by Yūsuf ibn Ibrāhīm, and completed in Mecca, on Wednesday 9 Rajab 848 [Oct. 22, 1444] (fol. 193b).
author: Qurashī, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad, 1297-1373
abstract: Commentary on Manār al-anwār fī uṣūl al-fiqh, a treatise on Ḥanafī uṣūl al-fiqh by al-Nasafī (d. 710/1310), with selections from al-Jawāhir al-muḍiʼah fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah and from other texts.
contents: 1. fol. 2b-40b: al-Multaqaṭ min al-Jawāhir al-muḍiʼah fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah / ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Qurashī. -- Mach, R. Yahuda, no. 4653.
2. fol. 40a-193b: Sharḥ al-Manār / ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ... [Ibn] Firishtah . -- Mach, R. Yahuda, no. 898.
3. fol. 193b-195a: Excerpt from al-Muḥīṭ and al-Baḥr al-ʻamīq fī manāsik al-bayt al-ʻatīq.
extent: i, 196, i leaves: paper ; 255 x 170 mm. bound to 255 x 175 mm.
